long_description: The Nathan Super 5k Electronics Armband is ready to rock your run in colorful style and comfort. It accommodates a wide range of smartphones, including Samsung Galaxy S3/S4 and iPhone 5. Universal armband offers a lightweight way to carry music on your arm; comfortable fit feels smooth on your skin. Lightweight, water-resistant neoprene helps protect your device. The Nathan Super 5k Electronics Armband features reflective accents that help increase your visibility in low light.
short_description: The Nathan Super 5k Electronics Armband is ready to rock your run in colorful style and comfort. It accommodates a wide range of smartphones, including Samsung Galaxy S3/S4 and iPhone 5.
